name: Dinari EZBC
description: The Dinari EZBC dShares token (EZBC.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the Franklin Bitcoin ETF (NYSE: EZBC), an exchange-traded fund designed to reflect the performance of Bitcoin before expenses. The Franklin Bitcoin ETF provides investors with simplified access to Bitcoin, offering a convenient and cost-effective way to gain exposure to the cryptocurrency market without the need to directly hold or manage Bitcoin. Each EZBC.d token is fully backed by a corresponding Franklin Bitcoin ETF share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, EZBC.d provides investors with exposure to Bitcoin through a regulated financial product, while benefiting from 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
